ai-mil5.5.7:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
ai-mil5.5.7:1.2_0: ‘Because of this potter’s work. He stood in the sky for a roof to look.’
ai-mil5.5.7:1.3_0: And he had spoken to him.
ai-mil5.5.7:1.4_0: ‘The Realized One’s hut is leaking off.’
ai-mil5.5.7:1.5_0: But what is the Realized One’s name by an elephant trainer, skilled in separation of a Realized One? How should we want to divert the Realized One?
ai-mil5.5.7:1.6_0: if you were to bite it with a potter, you must carry it around that potter’s work. That’s how that the Realized One became.
ai-mil5.5.7:1.7_0: When any Realized One’s hut was raining, the potter kept on wet, that broads are flaxed and fastened on the ground.
ai-mil5.5.7:1.8_0: This is a bowl and robes that should be extinguished before you.”
ai-mil5.5.7:2.2_0: ‘Because of this potter’s work. He stood in the sky for a roof to look.’
ai-mil5.5.7:2.3_0: And they had lied to him.
ai-mil5.5.7:2.4_0: ‘The Realized One’s hut is leaking off.’
ai-mil5.5.7:2.5_0: He looks after his blind old parents, decorated, and bracelets his parents. He binds them to let them loose. The Buddha obtains that green grass, sappy logs, when he has already been granted. And he obtained and praised by the Buddha, the result of past deeds, for the future, and the present.
ai-mil5.5.7:2.6_0: Because the Realized One has no so much oil.
ai-mil5.5.7:3.1_0: Whatever sound is, king of mountains, lies down, and said to him, “Great king, the king of mountains, all overflows, Yet of Mahākappina,
ai-mil5.5.7:3.2_0: In the same way, the Realized One has bathed with a oil-lash.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.1_0: But when a Realized One has compassion for future generations, it’s compassionate.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.2_0: Taking for two reasons the Realized One, they don’t expect to go to see him.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.3_0: Seeing these two reasons they don’t believe in the Realized One.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.4_0: If you’re able to make yourself in a hut, but you don’t make yourselves responsibility for your ears. That’s why you acted like this, and make you into that world.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.5_0: The Realized One doesn’t correct me concerning what’s beneficial for Buddha.”
ai-mil5.5.7:4.6_0: “It’s good, Sir, that you should repeat what I have said.”
